attributes.action: Stop dragging out SET for Non - EU citizens and make a decision within 3 months.
attributes.background: In light of the Windrush many children & grandchildren applied under the Windrush scheme as a result of their relative coming to help rebuild the UK. 11 months on and we are still waiting. Waiting times, fees, and eligibility requirements in general for Non EU citizens to settle are very hostile.

rejection.details:
We're unable to accept petitions where it is unclear what is being asked to be done. 

You may wish to consider starting a new petition on the timescales for applications under the Windrush scheme or a more general petition on the timescales for applications for non-EU citizens. 

You will also need to use a full name when starting an e-petition.
